name: Gingerbread Holiday
description:
Gingerbread Holiday is a romantic otome visual novel about figuring out how it is to celebrate Christmas when having bad ties to the Holiday. 

Story:
Play as Gabby as you bake gingerbread with your long term caring and supportive boyfriend, Mikael. Battle through the hardships that come with Christmas with your awesome boyfriend who will never let you down.

Specs:
1 romance route
5 CGs
Original soundtrack
3 endings
2600+ words

Genres: Romance, Otome, Visual Novel
Platforms: Windows, Mac, Linux
Language: English (US)
Screen Resolution: 1920x1080 (Full HD)

Credits:
Director: jennymhulla, https://www.jennymhulla.com/

Artists:
Sprites, CGs, Main menu screen - Akua,https://akua.carrd.co/
Backgrounds - syn_th, https://synphonyy.carrd.co/

Writer:
Crystal (Yanagi)

Programmers:
Ley Klussyn, https://klussyn.works/
Cygni, https://cygni.itch.io/

Audio:
Kevin Hu, https://chorxs-productions.com/music/

GUI:
Winter GUI Kit by Novekit

Please:
Please leave a comment with your thoughts after playing through. Thank you for your interest.
